# {{ site.title }} - Comprehensive Documentation Guide

> {{ site.description }}

## About This Repository

This is the comprehensive AI-friendly guide to {{ site.github.project_title }}. This extended file contains detailed information about the documentation structure, content organization, and key concepts to help AI assistants provide more accurate and contextual responses about this project.

## Project Overview

{% if site.github %}
- **Repository**: [{{ site.github.repository_nwo }}]({{ site.github.repository_url }})
- **Owner**: {{ site.github.owner_name }}
- **Created**: {% if site.github.project_created_at %}{{ site.github.project_created_at | date: "%Y-%m-%d" }}{% else %}Not available{% endif %}
- **Last Updated**: {{ site.time | date: "%Y-%m-%d" }}
- **Primary Language**: {% if site.github.language %}{{ site.github.language }}{% else %}Not specified{% endif %}
{% endif %}

## Complete Documentation Structure

{% assign sorted_pages = site.pages | sort: 'title' %}
{% for page in sorted_pages %}
{% if page.title and page.url != "/llms.txt" and page.url != "/llms-full.txt" and page.url != "/sitemap.xml" %}
### [{{ page.title }}]({{ site.url }}{{ site.baseurl }}{{ page.url }})

{% if page.description %}{{ page.description }}{% endif %}

{% if page.content %}
{% assign content_excerpt = page.content | strip_html | truncatewords: 50 %}
{% if content_excerpt != "" %}
**Content Preview**: {{ content_excerpt }}...
{% endif %}
{% endif %}

{% if page.tags %}
**Tags**: {% for tag in page.tags %}{{ tag }}{% unless forloop.last %}, {% endunless %}{% endfor %}
{% endif %}

{% if page.categories %}
**Categories**: {% for category in page.categories %}{{ category }}{% unless forloop.last %}, {% endunless %}{% endfor %}
{% endif %}

{% endif %}
{% endfor %}

    {% assign all_tags = all_tags | concat: page.tags %}

{% endfor %}

{% assign unique_tags = all_tags | uniq | sort %}

Important topics in this documentation:

{% for tag in unique_tags %}
- **{{ tag }}**: Pages tagged with this topic focus on related functionality and concepts
{% endfor %}
{% endif %}

## Recommended Learning Path

1. Start with the [homepage]({{ site.url }}{{ site.baseurl }}/) to understand the project's purpose
2. Review the installation and setup documentation {% assign setup_page = site.pages | where_exp: "page", "page.url contains '/setup/' or page.url contains '/installation/' or page.title contains 'Setup' or page.title contains 'Installation'" | first %}{% if setup_page %}([{{ setup_page.title }}]({{ site.url }}{{ site.baseurl }}{{ setup_page.url }})){% endif %}
3. Explore the examples to see practical applications
4. Refer to the API documentation for specific implementation details
